name: Rally Racer Dirt
description:
Rally Racer Dirt introduces best realistic and stunning based controls for a rally game. Have fun with drifty and realistic tuned physics with detailed graphics, vehicles and racing tracks.


Features:

* 14 Different rally cars,
* Tunable cars with adjustible suspension, anti roll bar, ride height and gearbox ratios.
* Upgradiable cars and drive properties.
* 6 Different tuned and enjoyable tracks,
* Trakcs has multiple ground surfaces tarmac, gravel, grass effects grip, drifting and vehicle physics.
* Carefully tuned car physics and controls.
* 2 main game modes to play: Challenge mode and Survival mode.


Game has two modes, survival and challange. In survival mode, you should drift and drive as long as you can, and pass checkpoints. In challenge mode there are 60 different challanges that you have to pass.
